[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tybys/aria2](./aria2.md) &gt; [FileInfo](./aria2.fileinfo.md)

## FileInfo interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FileInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [completedLength](./aria2.fileinfo.completedlength.md) | string | Completed length of this file in bytes. Please note that it is possible that sum of <code>completedLength</code> is less than the <code>completedLength</code> returned by the <code>aria2.tellStatus()</code> method. This is because <code>completedLength</code> in <code>aria2.getFiles()</code> only includes completed pieces. On the other hand, <code>completedLength</code> in <code>aria2.tellStatus()</code> also includes partially completed pieces. |
|  [index](./aria2.fileinfo.index.md) | string | Index of the file, starting at 1, in the same order as files appear in the multi-file torrent. |
|  [length](./aria2.fileinfo.length.md) | string | File size in bytes. |
|  [path](./aria2.fileinfo.path.md) | string | File path. |
|  [selected](./aria2.fileinfo.selected.md) | string | <code>true</code> if this file is selected by <code>--select-file</code> option. If <code>--select-file</code> is not specified or this is single-file torrent or not a torrent download at all, this value is always <code>true</code>. Otherwise <code>false</code>. |
|  [uris](./aria2.fileinfo.uris.md) | [Uri](./aria2.uri.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Returns a list of URIs for this file. The element type is the same struct used in the <code>aria2.getUris()</code> method. |
